<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">8cf63d932ffc15108e343e0ef699b6f9</macroponent><name>Log Related List Refresh Request on Record Page</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports}) {
	const rlName = event.payload.relatedListName;
	if (rlName) {
		let rlRequests = {...api.state.relatedListRefreshRequests};
		rlRequests[rlName] = { timestamp: new Date().getTime() };
		api.setState('relatedListRefreshRequests', rlRequests);
	}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-25 09:42:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>7e27b5d32ffc15108e343e0ef699b60f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Log Related List Refresh Request on Record Page</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_7e27b5d32ffc15108e343e0ef699b60f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-25 09:42:13</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
